original_title: 一般男女モニタリングAV 職場の同僚ドッキリ企画 出張先のビジネスホテルで新人女子社員と絶倫上司が2人っきりでまさかまさかの相部屋宿泊！次々と巻き起こるエッチなハプニングで急接近した同じ職場の男女が会社に内緒の生ハメセックス！翌日の仕事も忘れ没頭のけぞりイ…
overview: I want to have sex with a new female employee who I'm interested in! Have you ever thought? Recruiting an unequaled uncle boss who wishes so, and with the cooperation of the owner of a business hotel, co-workers who are on a business trip are in a shared room! And in order to shorten the distance between the two, an erotic surprise is developed in the room! Pushed by a lewd happening, a new female employee secretly asks for an unfaithful erection in the company! ? Monitoring the vivid exchanges and naughty developments of the two with complete voyeurism!
tagline: Things Get More And More Lewd As Men And Women Working Together Get Intimate At The Office Suddenly And Enjoy Raw Fucking In Secret At Work! They Forget They Have Work The Next Day As They Get Lost In Pleasure...
title: Ordinary Men And Women AV Survey. Workplace Coworker Pranks Variety Special. A Fresh Face Female Employee Ends Up Alone With Her Vigorous Boss At A Hotel On A Business Trip For An Unbelievable Overnight Room Sharing Scenario!
